text: CLOSE Reality TV star Chris Soules appeared in court Monday as his lawyers argued the charge against him should be dropped. Pool video A Buchanan County judge dismissed a contempt of court charge against former KWWL reporter Elizabeth Amanieh on Thursday. ( Photo : Special to the Register ) A judge has dismissed contempt of court charges against a former reporter for an eastern Iowa news station who took video of a court appearance by ` ` The Bachelor'' star Chris Soules. Elizabeth Amanieh, a former reporter for KWWL, an NBC affiliate station based in Waterloo, took video of Soules in April 2017 during his initial appearance.
